sn22.150:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkhan”ti?
sn22.150:1.4: “rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati rupam upadaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
sn22.150:1.8: vinnane sati vinnanam upadaya uppajjati ajjhattam sukhadukkham.
